slide0.heading: Welcome
slide0.text: AIQQQ TALK is an AI-powered persona system that instantly simulates target customers for interviews.

slide1.text:
Enter a profile to generate a persona.
Engage in conversations with AI personas across different ages, interests, and backgrounds—helping you gain deeper customer insight.

slide2.text:
Ideal for quick customer insights and idea testing.
Generated persona data can be exported and imported, making it easy to share across project teams.

texts.heading1: Entering personal information or sensitive data labeled as “Confidential” or “Highly Restricted” is prohibited.
texts.text1:
Do not enter unpublished product names, client NDA-related information, or any other confidential data.
For details, please refer to the dJ AI Guidelines.
texts.heading2: Do not share your screen directly with external parties.
texts.text2: If you wish to use this service for workshops or consulting, please contact us. For more information, see Settings > FAQ.
texts.heading3: Make sure to download the generated results as needed.
texts.text3:
Data will be lost if your browser cache is cleared.
Please download or copy the results as needed.
